pageProduct.name: Schick Stylist 3-in-1 Mens Electric Razor
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Schick Stylist 3 in 1 customise your look by shave, trim and edge facial hair.

Dual-Sided Stainless-steel blade designed to expertly shave, trim and edge facial hair.

- For wet or dry use.
with or without shave prep & waterproof for easy cleaning and use in the shower.

- USB rechargeable battery.

- 40 minutes runtime (when full charged).

- 4 months replaceable blade.
Lasts up to 4 months for best performance (Based on 5 minutes of use per day for 30 days. Actual results may vary).

- 3 Click-on Precision Combs.
for an even trim on face so you can achieve your desired length.


What's included:
- 1 Handle.
- 1 dual-sided blade.
- 3 trimming combs.
- USB charging cable.
- cleaning brush.
- instructions for use and cleaning.

Boxed Contents: 1 Handle, 1 dual-sided blade, 3 trimming combs, USB charging cable, cleaning brush, instructions for use and cleaning.

Size: 1 Pack

Directions

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
